title: Exodus Chapter 1 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Exodus chapter 1 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did the God do in Exodus 1:17?
options: Led the people through the wilderness
Commanded them, but saved the men children alive.
questions.correctAnswer: Commanded them, but saved the men children alive.
questions.explanation: Exodus 1:17 states: "But the midwives feared God, and did not as the king of Egypt commanded them, but saved the men children alive."

questions.question: What did Pharaoh do in Exodus 1:19?
options: Delivered ere the midwives come in unto them.
Spoke the word of the Lord
questions.correctAnswer: Delivered ere the midwives come in unto them.
questions.explanation: Exodus 1:19 states: "And the midwives said unto Pharaoh, Because the Hebrew women are not as the Egyptian women; for they are lively, and ..."

questions.question: Who said "Every son that is born ye shall cast into the river, and every daughter ye sh..." in Exodus 1:22?
questions.explanation: Exodus 1:22 states: "And Pharaoh charged all his people, saying, Every son that is born ye shall cast into the river, and every daughter y..."

questions.question: Where did the events of Exodus 1:1 take place?
questions.explanation: Exodus 1:1 states: "Now these are the names of the children of Israel, which came into Egypt; every man and his household came with Jacob."

questions.question: Where was Reuben according to Exodus 1:2?
questions.explanation: Exodus 1:2 states: "Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah,"

questions.question: Where was Joseph according to Exodus 1:5?
questions.explanation: Exodus 1:5 states: "And all the souls that came out of the loins of Jacob were seventy souls: for Joseph was in Egypt already."

questions.question: Where was Joseph according to Exodus 1:8?
questions.explanation: Exodus 1:8 states: "Now there arose up a new king over Egypt, which knew not Joseph."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Exodus 1:15?

questions.explanation: Exodus 1:17 states: "But the midwives feared God, and did not as the king of Egypt commanded them, but saved the men children alive."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 1:3: "Issachar, Zebulun, and ______,"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Issachar, Zebulun, and Benjamin,"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 1:4: "Dan, and ______, Gad, and Asher."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Dan, and Naphtali, Gad, and Asher."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 1:6: "And ______ died, and all his brethren, and all that generation."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Joseph died, and all his brethren, and all that generation."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 1:7: "And the children of ______ were fruitful, and increased abundantly, and multiplied, and waxed exceeding mighty; and the land was filled with them."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the children of Israel were fruitful, and increased abundantly, and multiplied, and waxed exceeding mighty; and t..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 1:9: "And he said unto his people, Behold, the people of the children of ______ are more and mightier than we:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he said unto his people, Behold, the people of the children of Israel are more and mightier than we:"
